short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Effortlessly share accounts, cookies, and sessions with E2E encryption, ensuring your data stays secure without sharing passwords

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Securely sharing browser sessions, cookies, and accounts between devices. Whether you're syncing your sessions or sharing access with friends, Flyssion ensures your data remains private and secure.

Key Features:

- End-to-End Encryption: Your session data is fully protected, accessible only to the intended recipient.
- Share Accounts Safely: Share login sessions with friends without ever revealing your password.
- Privacy First: Avoid insecure methods of transferring cookies or account data that could put your information at risk.
- Broad Compatibility: Works seamlessly with over 98% of websites for a hassle-free experience.

Flyssion is perfect for anyone looking to share sessions and accounts securely while prioritizing privacy.

Simplify session sharing while staying protected with Flyssion!

Note: While Flyssion seamlessly synchronizes sessions on most websites, a small number may rely on advanced device-fingerprinting methods that prevent successful syncing. Such instances are exceptionally rare and limited.
